TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed MessageQueueTransactionStatus extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the state of an internal Message Queuing transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When an instance of the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction> class has been created, its <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Status%2A> property is set by the constructor to `Initialized`. After a transaction has begun, but before it is committed or rolled back, the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction.Status%2A> is `Pending`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionStatus Aborted = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The transaction has been aborted and all participants have been notified.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionStatus Committed = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The transaction has been committed and all participants have been notified.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionStatus Initialized = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The transaction has been initialized. It has not yet been started.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionStatus Pending = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The transaction has been started. It has not yet been either committed or rolled back.
